name: al-react-doc-viewer
description: Document viewer for react. Renders online/local documents. Plugins for new document renderers.
author: Matthew Mogford

scripts.local-release: npm run build && rm al-react-doc-viewer-0.0.1.tgz && npm pack
scripts.version:patch: npm run version:pre && npm run version:changelog && npm version patch && npm run version:post
scripts.version:minor: npm run version:pre && npm run version:changelog && npm version minor && npm run version:post
scripts.version:major: npm run version:pre && npm run version:changelog && npm version major && npm run version:post
scripts.version:pre: if [ $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) != 'master' ]; then echo "\033[1m\033[31mCurrently on $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) branch. Please checkout master.\033[0m"; exit 1; else exit 0; fi
scripts.version:changelog: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.version:post: git push origin master && git push origin master --tags
